Activity Name.Description: This attribute is used to specify the Activity Name displayed to the user within the progress bar. This is a mandatory attribute for progress bar.
Activity Name.Name: Activity Name

Context.Description: This attribute is used to specify the context within the progress bar.
Context.Name: Context

ProcessName.Description: This attribute is used to specify the process name within the progress bar.
ProcessName.Name: ProcessName

Progress Indication.Description: This attribute is used to specify the progress indication within the progress bar.
Progress Indication.Name: Progress Indication

Stages.Description: This attribute is used to specify the list of stages in the progress. A minimum of two stages must be specified for them to be drawn in the progress window.
Stages.Name: Stages

Subcontext.Description: This attribute is used to specify the sub-context within the progress bar.
Subcontext.Name: Subcontext

Total Count.Description: This attribute is used for defining the total number of items being processed. If the count is unknown, it can be set to 0. This is mandatory for progress bar.
Total Count.Name: Total Count

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use
